attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are now part of a country dominated by big brother syndrome which  i bieleve to be unfair for the regular law obiding people of this country we are told its for our own benefit but im not so sure i want a stop to the intrusion in our private lives by the use of cameras everywhere and so called id cards.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ID-without-card/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
